analysis.description:
CZRLocker.fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x6c508b8aacc804a9a359892a28081d25b3612123.sol#140-143) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- goalCompletedBlock == 0 && totalReceived >= GOAL

CZRLocker.fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x6c508b8aacc804a9a359892a28081d25b3612123.sol#140-143) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- goalCompletedBlock == 0 && totalReceived >= GOAL
CZRLocker.unlockCZR (/unique_chucks/19/0x6c508b8aacc804a9a359892a28081d25b3612123.sol#88-130) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- month == 0
	- unlockAmount == 0

CZRLocker.unlockCZR (/unique_chucks/19/0x6c508b8aacc804a9a359892a28081d25b3612123.sol#88-130) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-t.transferFrom(owner,addr,unlockAmount) (/unique_chucks/19/0x6c508b8aacc804a9a359892a28081d25b3612123.sol#119-120)

CZRLocker.unlockCZR has external calls inside a loop:
	- t.transferFrom(owner,addr,unlockAmount) (/unique_chucks/19/0x6c508b8aacc804a9a359892a28081d25b3612123.sol#119-120)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/19/0x6c508b8aacc804a9a359892a28081d25b3612123.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/19/0x6c508b8aacc804a9a359892a28081d25b3612123.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_tokenAddr' of CZRLocker.CZRLocker (/unique_chucks/19/0x6c508b8aacc804a9a359892a28081d25b3612123.sol#46-47) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_unlocker' of CZRLocker.CZRLocker (/unique_chucks/19/0x6c508b8aacc804a9a359892a28081d25b3612123.sol#47-48) is not in mixedCase
